## FieldPathByValue type

Type which eagerly collects all paths through a fieldType that matches a give type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FieldPathByValue<TFieldValues extends FieldValues, TValue> = {
    [Key in FieldPath<TFieldValues>]: FieldPathValue<TFieldValues, Key> extends TValue ? Key : never;
}[FieldPath<TFieldValues>];
```
**References:** [FieldValues](./react-hook-form.fieldvalues.md)<!-- -->, [FieldPath](./react-hook-form.fieldpath.md)<!-- -->, [FieldPathValue](./react-hook-form.fieldpathvalue.md)

## Example


```typescript
FieldPathByValue<{foo: {bar: number}, baz: number, bar: string}, number>
  = 'foo.bar' | 'baz'
```
